DOC.brief_summary: The main purposes of this study are: - to determine the effects of chondroitin sulphate on brain response to pain assessed through fMRI in patients with knee osteoarthritis. - to investigate the relationship between treatment response detected by fMRI and the results of the different parameters of clinical assessment.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of the Effects of Chondroitin Sulphate in Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis With Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging (fMRI)
